hail.no_response: (There is no response to your hail.)
hail.alien_voice: (An alien voice says something in a language you do not recognize.)
hail.sorry_disabled: Sorry, we can't help you, because our ship is disabled.
hail.hang_on: Hang on, we'll be there in a minute.
hail.help_offer_trouble: Looks like you've gotten yourself into a bit of trouble. Would you like us to
hail.patch_fuel: patch you up and give you some fuel?
hail.sorry_too_small: Sorry, my ship is too small to have the right equipment to assist you.
hail.land_cost: If you want to land here, it'll cost you

hail.thank_freedom: Thank you for granting us our freedom!

hail.sorry_no_energy: Sorry, we don't have any energy.
hail.sorry_unable_assist: Sorry, we are unable to assist you.
hail.dont_push_luck: Yeah, right. Don't push your luck.
hail.no_need_assist: You don't seem to be in need of repairs or fuel assistance.
hail.not_worth_while: Sorry, but you don't have enough money to be worth my while.
hail.leave_alone_cost: If you want us to leave you alone, it'll cost you
